content.en: Soft Computing: Researchers have explored the methodological contributions of algorithms like neural networks, fuzzy logic, and genetic algorithms in the electricity supply industry. They have also investigated the relevance of soft computing tools, such as fuzzy sets, artificial neural networks, and genetic algorithms, in pattern recognition problems. Additionally, they have studied the characteristics and applications of soft computing in modeling and computation, as well as its role in the conception, design, and deployment of intelligent systems.
content.da: Blød beregning: Forskere har undersøgt de metodologiske bidrag fra algoritmer som neurale netværk, fuzzy logic og genetiske algoritmer inden for elforsyningsindustrien. De har også undersøgt relevansen af bløde beregningsværktøjer, såsom fuzzy sets, kunstige neurale netværk og genetiske algoritmer, i mønstergenkendelsesproblemer. Derudover har de studeret egenskaberne og anvendelserne af blød beregning i modellering og beregning samt dens rolle i udtænkning, design og implementering af intelligente systemer.
